list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large hole in the ground.
a hollow or indentation in a surface.
an area at the side of a track where race cars are serviced and refueled.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had a flat tire when he came into the pits
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta có một lốp xe phẳng khi anh ta vào hố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of the floor of an exchange in which a particular stock or commodity is traded, typically by open outcry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: pooled commodity funds liquidated positions in the corn and soybean pits
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các quỹ hàng hóa được tổng hợp các vị trí thanh lý trong các hố ngô và đậu tương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an enclosure in which animals are made to fight.
set someone or something in conflict or competition with.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a chance to pit herself against him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cơ hội để hố với anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a hollow or indentation in the surface of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: rain poured down, pitting the bare earth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mưa đổ xuống, vỗ đất trần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: drive a race car into the pits for fuel or maintenance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pitted on lap 36 with sudden engine trouble
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta đổ xô vào Lap 36 với sự cố động cơ đột ngột
